SEARCH
Package com.tradingcards.elements.card

Class CardModel

java.lang.Object
com.tradingcards.elements.card.CardModel
public class CardModel extends Object
Represents a model for a trading card, encapsulating properties such as name, rarity, variant, value, quantity, and image path. Provides methods to get and set these properties and to calculate the final value of a card based on its variant.

    • calculateValue

      protected double calculateValue(double value, String variant)
      Calculates the final value of the card based on its base value and variant.

      The variant affects the final value as follows:

      • Normal: ×1 (base value)
      • Extended-art: ×1.5 (50% increase)
      • Full-art: ×2.0 (100% increase)
      • Alt-art: ×3.0 (200% increase)
      Parameters:
      value - the base value of the card
      variant - the variant type of the card
      Returns:
      the calculated value after applying the variant multiplier

    • hasCopy

      protected Boolean hasCopy(CollectionModel sharedCollection, String name, CardModel newCard)
      Determines whether a card with the same name already exists in the collection and has the same rarity, variant, and value.
      Parameters:
      sharedCollection - the main collection to check against
      name - the name of the card to compare
      newCard - the new card being checked
      Returns:
      true if a card with the same name and properties exists; false otherwise
